plot: Damian and Alex are perfect people, with jobs, cars and a healthy diet. However they try to deal with obsession: one for people-watching, one for each other.
title: Orange/Milk
plot_es: Damian and Alex are perfect people, with jobs, cars and a healthy diet. However they try to deal with obsession: one for people-watching, one for each other.
plot_en: Damian and Alex are perfect people, with jobs, cars and a healthy diet. However they try to deal with obsession: one for people-watching, one for each other.
